site_title: Ready To Land by Didier Boursin

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper Plane 30 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It is "Ready To Land" designed by Didier Boursin. Even though this paper craft resembles a dart, it is a actually a very steady glider and will glide gently when you fly it. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. Enjoy!!! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 29 : Space Dart by Paul Jackson", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/kD0rkZSGG78 Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
